snippet.title: On the Origin of Science Writers – Phenomena
snippet.description: Every now and then, I get an email from someone who’s keen to get into science writing and wants to know how I started. Whenever I reply, and I always try to, I’m always left with the nagging feeli...

snippet.title: Sustainable Agriculture -- National Geographic
snippet.description: Explore sustainable agriculture stories, and learn more about organic farming and food with National Geographic. Get facts, information, see pictures, and watch free videos. Learn what threatens global food supply and the planet's ecosystems, and what you can do to help.

snippet.title: Race Is On to Find Life Under Antarctic Ice
snippet.description: A century after explorers competed d to reach the South Pole, three countries are racing to discover life under the Antarctic ice.
